text: Confessions on a Dance Floor is the tenth studio album by American singer- songwriter Madonna. It was released on November 9, 2005 and debuted at number one on the US Billboard 200. The lead single "Hung Up" was released on October 17, 2005 and peaked at number seven on the US Billboard Hot 100. ==Track listing== == References == Category:2005 albums Category:Concept albums Category:Madonna albums Category:Warner Records albums
title: Confessions on a Dance Floor
